transcription.text: Annabelle’s Serpentine Dance William Kennedy Dickson and William Heise, Edison Manufacturing Company, USA, 1895 Danse Serpentine Louis and Auguste Lumière, France, 1897–99 Le voyage sur Jupiter (A Trip to Jupiter) Segundo de Chomón, France, 1909 The Cabinet of Dr. Caligari Robert Wiene, Germany, 1919 King of Jazz John Murray Anderson, USA, 1930 The Wizard of Oz Victor Fleming, USA, 1939 Black Narcissus Michael Powell and Emeric Pressburger, United Kingdom, 1947 Singin' in the Rain Stanley Donen and Gene Kelly, USA, 1952 Vertigo Alfred Hitchock, USA, 1958 Jiang shan mei ren (The Kingdom and the Beauty) Han Hsiang Li, Hong Kong, 1959 Ukikusa (Floating Weeds) Yasujirô Ozu, Japan, 1959 Le mépris (Contempt) Jean-Luc Godard, France / Italy, 1963 Les parapluies de Cherbourg (The Umbrellas of Cherbourg) Jacques Demy, France / Germany, 1964 Gumnaam Raja Nawathe, India, 1965 Daisies Věra Chytilová, Czechoslovakia, 1966 2001: A Space Odyssey Stanley Kubrick, UK/ USA, 1968 Willy Wonka & the Chocolate Factory Mel Stuart, USA / East Germany / West Germany, 1971
